info.author: Mehmet Oner Yalcin
info.description:
Important Note:

The zip packet is password protected. Please contact to oneryalcin@gmail.com (contact person must be an eircom employee 
@eircom.ie mails) to get password and "Template" and "Source Files" directory content. Without "Template" and "Source Files"
 directory content program tool will not work.

About
======================
This program can and must only be used 
- to populate 7210 SAS, 7450 ESS and 7750 SR configs
- to populate Commissioning Documentation 
- to populate Site Topology Image

for Eircom NGA APT deployments. 


Program Version and history
============================
v0.1 Beta, January 2014 - Initial Release

Author and Bug Report
======================
Mehmet Oner Yalcin - oneryalcin@gmail.com


Python version (Coded)
====================
- 2.7.5 (default, May 15 2013, 22:44:16) [MSC v.1500 64 bit (AMD64)]


Dependencies (3rd Party Library)
================================
 'setuptools-2.0-py2.7.egg'  		
 - Not exactly a dependency, but uesd to install the other 3rd party libraries

 'python_pptx-0.2.6-py2.7.egg'
 - this library creates Microsoft PPTX files (used to generate topology Image)

 'docx-0.2.1-py2.7.egg'
 - This library is used to read and write Microsoft Docx files (office 2007 or newer)

 'lxml-3.2.4-py2.7-win-amd64.egg'
 - This library is used to read and process xml files (docx files are indeed, xml files)

 'xlrd'
 - This library is used to read excel files

Installation
=======================
At this moment please do not use setuptools to install NGA APT config generator
Download the program and extract it. Ex: C:\NGA APT\eircom_nga_apt_tool-0.0.1
Simply double click install.bat

Running the program
==========================
run populate files.bat and follow the instructions
info.keywords: Eircom APT NGA Config Generator eircom
info.name: eircom_nga_apt_tool
